original_title: Operation Yukthiya nets over 1,500 suspects in past 24 hours
original_body_lines: Another 1,534 suspects were arrested in the past 24 hour window that ended at 12:30 am today in the ongoing operation "Yukthiya".
84 suspects are being further investigated  based on detention orders.
23 suspects are being investigation for the suspected possession illegal assets.
Multiples types of drugs, including heroin and marijuana, were siezed during the operations as well.
